00104 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTag  
00105 {
00106 public:
00107   CIccTag();
00108 
00118   virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() const {return new CIccTag;}
00119 
00120   virtual ~CIccTag();
00121 
00128   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return icMaxEnumType; }
00129   virtual bool IsArrayType() { return false; }
00130   virtual bool IsMBBType() { return false; }
00131 
00132   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() { return "CIccTag"; }
00133 
00134   static CIccTag* Create(icTagTypeSignature sig);
00135 
00136   virtual IIccExtensionTag* GetExtension() {return NULL;}
00137 
00146   virtual bool IsSupported() { return true; }
00147 
00160   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO) { return false; }
00161 
00173   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO) { return false; }
00174 
00182   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription) { sDescription.empty(); }
00183 
00193   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
00194 
00195   //All tags start with a reserved value.  Allocate a place to put it.
00196   icUInt32Number m_nReserved;
00197 };
00198

00207 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagUnknown : public CIccTag
00208 {
00209 public:
00210   CIccTagUnknown();
00211   CIccTagUnknown(const CIccTagUnknown &ITU);
00212   CIccTagUnknown &operator=(const CIccTagUnknown &UnknownTag);
00213   virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() const {return new CIccTagUnknown(*this);}
00214   virtual ~CIccTagUnknown();
00215 
00216   virtual bool IsSupported() { return false; }
00217 
00218   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return m_nType; }
00219   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() { return "CIccTagUnknown"; }
00220 
00221   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00222   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00223 
00224   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00225 
00226 
00227 protected:
00228   icTagTypeSignature m_nType;
00229   icUInt8Number *m_pData;
00230   icUInt32Number m_nSize;
00231 };

00332 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagSignature : public CIccTag
00333 {
00334 public:
00335   CIccTagSignature();
00336   CIccTagSignature(const CIccTagSignature &ITS);
00337   CIccTagSignature &operator=(const CIccTagSignature &SignatureTag);
00338   virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() const {return new CIccTagSignature(*this);}
00339   virtual ~CIccTagSignature();
00340 
00341   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return icSigSignatureType; }
00342   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() { return "CIccTagSignature"; }
00343 
00344   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00345 
00346   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00347   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00348 
00349   icUInt32Number GetValue() const { return m_nSig; }
00350   void SetValue(icUInt32Number sig) { m_nSig = sig; }
00351   icUInt32Number operator=(icUInt32Number sig) { SetValue(sig); return m_nSig; }
00352   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
00353 
00354 protected:
00355   icUInt32Number m_nSig;
00356 };

00376 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagNamedColor2 : public CIccTag
00377 {
00378 public:
00379   CIccTagNamedColor2(int nSize=1, int nDeviceCoords=0);
00380   CIccTagNamedColor2(const CIccTagNamedColor2 &ITNC);
00381   CIccTagNamedColor2 &operator=(const CIccTagNamedColor2 &NamedColor2Tag);
00382   virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() const {return new CIccTagNamedColor2(*this);}
00383   virtual ~CIccTagNamedColor2();
00384 
00385   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return icSigNamedColor2Type; }
00386   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() { return "CIccTagNamedColor2"; }
00387 
00388   virtual bool UseLegacyPCS() const { return true; } //Treat Lab Encoding differently?
00389 
00390   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00391 
00392   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00393   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00394 
00395   const icChar *GetPrefix() const { return m_szPrefix; }
00396   void SetPrefix(const icChar *szPrefix);
00397 
00398   const icChar *GetSufix() const { return m_szSufix; }
00399   void SetSufix(const icChar *szSufix);
00400 
00401   icUInt32Number GetVendorFlags() const { return m_nVendorFlags; }
00402   void SetVendorFlags(icUInt32Number nVendorFlags) {m_nVendorFlags = nVendorFlags;}
00403 
00404   //The following Find functions return the zero based index of the color
00405   //or -1 to indicate that the color was not found.
00406   icInt32Number FindColor(const icChar *szColor) const;
00407   icInt32Number FindRootColor(const icChar *szRootColor) const;
00408   icInt32Number FindDeviceColor(icFloatNumber *pDevColor) const;
00409   icInt32Number FindPCSColor(icFloatNumber *pPCS, icFloatNumber dMinDE=1000.0);
00410 
00411   bool InitFindCachedPCSColor();
00412   //FindPCSColor returns the zero based index of the color or -1 to indicate that the color was not found.
00413   //InitFindPCSColor must be called before FindPCSColor
00414   icInt32Number FindCachedPCSColor(icFloatNumber *pPCS, icFloatNumber dMinDE=1000.0) const;
00415 
00417   void ResetPCSCache();
00418 
00419   bool GetColorName(std::string &sColorName, icInt32Number index) const;
00420   SIccNamedColorEntry &operator[](icUInt32Number index) const {return *(SIccNamedColorEntry*)((icUInt8Number*)m_NamedColor + index * m_nColorEntrySize);}
00421   SIccNamedColorEntry *GetEntry(icUInt32Number index) const {return (SIccNamedColorEntry*)((icUInt8Number*)m_NamedColor + index * m_nColorEntrySize);}
00422 
00423   icUInt32Number GetSize() const { return m_nSize; }
00424   icUInt32Number GetDeviceCoords() const {return m_nDeviceCoords;}
00425   void SetSize(icUInt32Number nSize, icInt32Number nDeviceCoords=-1);
00426 
00427   virtual void SetColorSpaces(icColorSpaceSignature csPCS, icColorSpaceSignature csDevice);
00428   icColorSpaceSignature GetPCS() const {return m_csPCS;}
00429   icColorSpaceSignature GetDeviceSpace() const {return m_csDevice;}
00430 
00431   icFloatNumber NegClip(icFloatNumber v) const;
00432   icFloatNumber UnitClip(icFloatNumber v) const;
00433 
00434   void Lab2ToLab4(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src) const;
00435   void Lab4ToLab2(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src) const;
00436 
00437   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
00438 
00439 protected:
00440   icChar m_szPrefix[32];
00441   icChar m_szSufix[32];
00442   
00443   SIccNamedColorEntry *m_NamedColor;
00444   SIccNamedLabEntry *m_NamedLab; 
00445   icUInt32Number m_nColorEntrySize;
00446 
00447   icUInt32Number m_nVendorFlags;
00448   icUInt32Number m_nDeviceCoords;
00449   icUInt32Number m_nSize;
00450 
00451   icColorSpaceSignature m_csPCS;
00452   icColorSpaceSignature m_csDevice;
00453 };

00462 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagXYZ : public CIccTag
00463 {
00464 public:
00465   CIccTagXYZ(int nSize=1);
00466   CIccTagXYZ(const CIccTagXYZ &ITXYZ);
00467   CIccTagXYZ &operator=(const CIccTagXYZ &XYZTag);
00468   virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() const {return new CIccTagXYZ(*this);}
00469   virtual ~CIccTagXYZ();
00470 
00471   virtual bool IsArrayType() { return m_nSize > 1; }
00472 
00473   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return icSigXYZType; }
00474   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() { return "CIccTagXYZ"; }
00475 
00476   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00477 
00478   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00479   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00480 
00481   icXYZNumber &operator[](icUInt32Number index) const {return m_XYZ[index];}
00482   icXYZNumber *GetXYZ(icUInt32Number index) {return &m_XYZ[index];}
00483   icUInt32Number GetSize() const { return m_nSize; }
00484   void SetSize(icUInt32Number nSize, bool bZeroNew=true);
00485   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
00486 
00487 protected:
00488   icXYZNumber *m_XYZ;
00489   icUInt32Number m_nSize;
00490 };

00499 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagChromaticity : public CIccTag
00500 {

00504   CIccTagChromaticity &operator=(const CIccTagChromaticity &ChromTag);
00505   virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() const {return new CIccTagChromaticity(*this);}
00506   virtual ~CIccTagChromaticity();
00507 
00508   virtual bool IsArrayType() { return m_nChannels > 1; }
00509 
00510   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return icSigChromaticityType; }
00511   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() { return "CIccTagChromaticity"; }
00512 
00513   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00514 
00515   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00516   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00517 
00518   icChromaticityNumber &operator[](icUInt32Number index) {return m_xy[index];}
00519   icChromaticityNumber *Getxy(icUInt32Number index) {return &m_xy[index];}
00520   icUInt32Number GetSize() const { return m_nChannels; }
00521   void SetSize(icUInt16Number nSize, bool bZeroNew=true);
00522 
00523   icUInt16Number m_nColorantType;
00524 
00525   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
00526 
00527 protected:
00528   icUInt16Number m_nChannels;
00529   icChromaticityNumber *m_xy;
00530 };

00541 template <class T, icTagTypeSignature Tsig>
00542 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagFixedNum : public CIccTag
00543 {
00544 public:
00545   CIccTagFixedNum(int nSize=1);
00546   CIccTagFixedNum(const CIccTagFixedNum &ITFN);
00547   CIccTagFixedNum &operator=(const CIccTagFixedNum &FixedNumTag);
00548   virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() { return new CIccTagFixedNum(*this); }
00549   virtual ~CIccTagFixedNum();
00550 
00551   virtual bool IsArrayType() { return m_nSize > 1; }
00552 
00553   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return Tsig; }
00554   virtual const icChar *GetClassName();
00555 
00556   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00557 
00558   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00559   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00560 
00561   T &operator[](icUInt32Number index) {return m_Num[index];}
00562 
00564   icUInt32Number GetSize() const { return m_nSize; }
00565   void SetSize(icUInt32Number nSize, bool bZeroNew=true);
00566 
00567 protected:
00568   T *m_Num;
00569   icUInt32Number m_nSize;
00570 };

00608 
00609   virtual bool IsArrayType() { return m_nSize > 1; }
00610 
00611   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return Tsig; }

00615 
00616   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);

00624 
00625 protected:

00706 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccLocalizedUnicode
00707 {
00708 public: //member functions
00709   CIccLocalizedUnicode();
00710   CIccLocalizedUnicode(const CIccLocalizedUnicode& ILU);
00711   CIccLocalizedUnicode &operator=(const CIccLocalizedUnicode &UnicodeText);
00712   virtual ~CIccLocalizedUnicode();
00713 
00714   icUInt32Number GetLength() const { return m_nLength; }
00715   icUInt16Number *GetBuf() const { return m_pBuf; }
00716 
00717   icUInt32Number GetAnsiSize();
00718   const icChar *GetAnsi(icChar *szBuf, icUInt32Number nBufSize);
00719   
00720   void SetSize(icUInt32Number);
00721 
00722   void SetText(const icChar *szText,
00723                icLanguageCode nLanguageCode = icLanguageCodeEnglish,
00724                icCountryCode nRegionCode = icCountryCodeUSA);
00725   void SetText(const icUInt16Number *sszUnicode16Text,
00726                icLanguageCode nLanguageCode = icLanguageCodeEnglish,
00727                icCountryCode nRegionCode = icCountryCodeUSA);
00728   void SetText(const icUInt32Number *sszUnicode32Text,
00729                icLanguageCode nLanguageCode = icLanguageCodeEnglish,
00730                icCountryCode nRegionCode = icCountryCodeUSA);
00731 
00732   const icChar *operator=(const icChar *szText) { SetText(szText); return szText; }
00733   const icUInt16Number *operator=(const icUInt16Number *sszText) { SetText(sszText); return sszText; }
00734   const icUInt32Number *operator=(const icUInt32Number *sszText) { SetText(sszText); return sszText; }
00735 
00736   //Data
00737   icLanguageCode m_nLanguageCode;
00738   icCountryCode m_nCountryCode;
00739 
00740 protected:
00741   icUInt32Number m_nLength;
00742 
00743   icUInt16Number *m_pBuf;
00744 
00745 };

00770   virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() const {return new CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode(*this);}
00771   virtual ~CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode();
00772 
00773   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return icSigMultiLocalizedUnicodeType; }
00774   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() { return "CIcciSigMultiLocalizedUnicode"; }
00775 
00776   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00777 
00778   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00779   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00780   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
00781 
00782   CIccLocalizedUnicode *Find(icLanguageCode nLanguageCode = icLanguageCodeEnglish,
00783                              icCountryCode nRegionCode = icCountryCodeUSA);
00784

00786                icLanguageCode nLanguageCode = icLanguageCodeEnglish,
00787                icCountryCode nRegionCode = icCountryCodeUSA);

00792                icLanguageCode nLanguageCode = icLanguageCodeEnglish,
00793                icCountryCode nRegionCode = icCountryCodeUSA);

00795

00811 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagData : public CIccTag
00812 {
00813 public:
00814   CIccTagData(int nSize=1);
00815   CIccTagData(const CIccTagData &ITD);
00816   CIccTagData &operator=(const CIccTagData &DataTag);
00817   virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() const {return new CIccTagData(*this);}
00818   virtual ~CIccTagData();
00819 
00820   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return icSigDataType; }
00821   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() { return "CIccTagData"; }
00822 
00823   virtual bool IsArrayType() { return m_nSize > 1; }
00824 
00825   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00826 
00827   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00828   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00829 
00830   icUInt32Number GetSize() const { return m_nSize; }
00831   void SetSize(icUInt32Number nSize, bool bZeroNew=true);
00832   icUInt8Number &operator[] (icUInt32Number index) { return m_pData[index]; }
00833   icUInt8Number *GetData(icUInt32Number index) { return &m_pData[index];}
00834 
00835   void SetTypeAscii(bool bIsAscii=true) { m_nDataFlag = bIsAscii ? icAsciiData : icBinaryData; }
00836   bool IsTypeAscii() { return m_nDataFlag == icAsciiData; }
00837   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
00838 
00839 protected:
00840   icUInt32Number m_nDataFlag;
00841   icUInt8Number *m_pData;
00842   icUInt32Number m_nSize;
00843 };
